tidbits.title: Wine Country
tidbits.description: Moldova is known for its wine production, with vineyards spread across the countryside and a long history of winemaking.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country boasts a rich cultural heritage, seen in its traditional music, dance, crafts, and historic monasteries and fortresses.

tidbits.title: Challenges and Development
tidbits.description: Moldova faces economic challenges but is striving for development, aiming to strengthen its economy and foster international partnerships.
